roleset.name: ask a favor, ask a request, ask for

example.name: Example with all args
example.text: the ANC 's demands on the government to create a climate for negotiations
example.arg: to create a climate for negotiations

example.name: Sun looks like arg 0, but actually modifies the verb.
example.text: Sun to meet demand for its newest computers

example.name: arg 0 after the rel
example.text: I should make some demands of my own.

example.name: One more with args 1 and 2
example.text: It's demands for an Islamic state

roleset.note: Roleset based on demand.01. Verbnet class beg 58.2. Framenet class request. Framed by Katie.
